column4: I ran apt-get update and apt-get dist-upgrade but i can't get feisty
someone plz help me upgrade to feisty
!upgrade
you donT' want to upgrade jsut now wait a few days
do you know why it isn't telling me ther is an update i have auto update on, and when i try to get it manually i see no updates
wich version of ubuntu are you using ?  the upgrade thing only shows if you are using edgy
i am on edgy
I don'T know why you don'T have it , sorry
what are you triying to acheive ?
a bunch of hdd
are those hdd mounted ?
a bunch of hdd's that are mounted in dmraid keep showing up
ah and you want them to disappear ? I donT' think you can
above the line that separates the favorites
welo the os thinks they arent mounted but they really are just in dmraid
this never happened to me in 6.10
will unmounting them keep you from using them in dmraid ?  remove them from fstab and they won't automount
they are showing up because they aren't mounted
I don't have entries for them in the fstab
nothing umounted should show up in nautilus
I donT' know then ,  sorry,  try looking in the forum
when I right click it gives me the option to mount them
I still don'T know sorry
have a look in  gconf-editor,   /apps/nautilus/..... see if there is something there that can help
